full_text: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR M. J. Epstein DATE 8/23/05 TIME 2:18 P.M. M. Alina OF PHONE/ MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE SIGNED L IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR TF DATE TIME M. OF PHONE/ MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE Call me back, please SIGNED IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR M. J. Epstein DATE 8/22 TIME 4:21 P.M. M. Alina OF PHONE/ MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE Please call her SIGNED 07/26/17 L Page 58 of 124 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR M. J. Epstein DATE 8/21 TIME 11:39 A.M. M. Nadia OF PHONE/ MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE I cannot work today. Had B'ney Mitzvah to be here at 11 am SIGNED Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031779

text_blocks.content: I cannot work today. Had B'ney Mitzvah to be here at 11 am

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scan of a page from a binder containing message slips. The page is labeled 'Page 58 of 124'. The message slips are dated August 2005, while the signature date on one of the slips is July 2017. The document is generally legible, with some handwritten text being more difficult to read than others.
